question:
Is the following statement something you would say?
"I should align myself with the harmonious natural workings of the universe"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe in finding harmony with the flow or “Way” of the universe"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"There is an all-powerful, all-knowing, all-good God who created the universe"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Mankind should be concerned with making money rather than with spiritual seeking"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am most fulfilled when great wealth and material luxuries are the most important aspects of my life"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe in trying to live life in harmony with nature"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Harmony with nature is fundamental"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Balance and harmony are at the foundation of the natural world"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe that happiness can only be attained through great wealth and achievement"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe in redemption through faith in Jesus Christ"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Humans are supreme to all other things"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"People should pursue fame, wealth, and gratification of their physical desires above all other things, even happiness or morality"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Harmony with nature and other people is very important"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"There is a fundamental holistic unity underlying the universe which is the source of all things"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Everything in the universe is intricately interconnected"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe that simplicity, inner peace, freedom from desires, non-action and going along with nature are characteristics that lead to living well"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Christianity or Judaism or Islam is the one true religion"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I should live in harmony with my environment and nature"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe in living in harmony with nature"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"There is One True God and path to salvation"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe that harmony, creative spontaneity, attainment of emptiness and wu wei are among the principal virtues"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Material possessions are more important than what money can't buy"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe in going with the flow and avoiding interruption or resistance to the natural course of events, in accordance with the Taoist concept of wu wei; doing by not doing"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I strive to compete against other people to succeed and achieve a high status"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe there is one true god who reveals himself through a divinely inspired book"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"The whole universe functions according to a fundamental essence, called the Tao, that embraces the concepts of yin and yang"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"My life should be guided by principles like taking no action, accepting what happens, appreciating simple pleasures, and living in the present"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I live in harmony with nature, emphasizing simplicity and spontaneity in my life"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I pursue wealth at all costs"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Everything in the universe is connected and constantly changing and flowing"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Everything is interconnected via underlying forces such as yin and yang"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe in prayer to an ever-present personal god"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"My highest goal is obtaining wealth and power"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Harmony with nature and eternal principals, rather than going against them, is fundamental for proper living"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe people should live simply and in harmony with nature"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"The flow of life emerges out of balance and harmony of all things, and in turn embodies concepts such as virtue, interconnectedness, flexibility, softness, simplicity, humility, and compassion"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"There is a cosmic unifying principle (which we call “Tao”) in everything"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"The universe and everything in it does not exist as separate objects but rather is part of one complete, harmonious whole"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I judge others based on their occupation and material wealth"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"There is an all-pervading force flowing throughout existence known as the Tao"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe harmony and balance should be cornerstones of our lives"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I place great importance in material possessions"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Material goods and fame are important"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"All things and events are part of a great unity interconnected via Qi"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Killing animals for sport is acceptable"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Everything in the universe is linked together as one"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"My life’s mission is to amass material possessions"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"There is a creator god to whom I owe my existence"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe that working harmoniously with nature is very important in life"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"There is a way of life in tune with the universe that one should cultivate and follow"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No
